author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 27-year-old man was hacked to death by an indentified gang after his younger brother eloped with a girl of the same community on Sunday.

Rajendran of Arundadiyar Colony in Karipatti has two sons, Rajasekar (27) and Gyanasekaran (25). Rajasekar was married to Sobitha and has three children. Gyanasekran was in love with Monisha (18) of the same colony.

However, her parents did not accept their love. Both eloped and got married. The girl’s family said that Rajasekar arranged their marriage and he knew of the couple’s hideout.

On Sunday, when Rajasekar parked his car and was about to enter his house, the gang hacked him to death. When Sobitha attempted to prevent them, the gang also inflicted injuries on her.

She was taken to the Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital. The body of Rajasekar was taken to Salem GH. The police said the girl’s relatives Prabhu, Baladinakaran and Saranraj among others were involved in the murder. A search is on for them.
title: Man hacked to death
